entry.title: How to linearize your cluster
entry.summary: In the discussion, a query was raised regarding the progress of specific work within a project. The question aimed to identify the correct branch for tracking this ongoing development. The branch in question was referred to as `wip_mempool_fuzz`. This indicates an interest in following updates and contributions specifically related to the mempool fuzzing efforts within the repository. Such inquiries are crucial for collaborators or individuals interested in contributing to or staying informed about specific aspects of a project's development cycle.
